name: MIDAS Inc.
description:
You've been granted the power to turn any object you touch into solid gold. Naturally, you saw this as a business opportunity.

MIDAS Inc. is a frantic game in which you turn as much of a household as you can into gold and score points based on each item's value, while avoiding touching the household pets and plotting the perfect path through the house in order to earn the highest score possible.

Made for the Mini Jam for the theme "Gold" and the limitation "One Minute Timer". All in-game art (except the mona lisa) and sfx made by me, music made by Pheonton from OpenGameArt.
